Name: Ghouls Underground
About the game: IF you want my last game CURSE OF RASUMAN to appear on Steam too, please support on Kickstarter: -of-rasuman-the-story-of-archibaldoega-limited-colour I created the adaptation of an imaginary arcade cabinet video game. Only one level but this one is really gigantic to explore! I can not say that this is an endless game, because there is an end, but it will take you so many hours to overcome it. Lead a team of heroes to destroy evil in a dangerous labyrinth full of various enemies and traps. A lot of treasures and weapons to find! keyboard or usb xbox controller available (I don't try other joypads) Warning this is not a simply shoot em up but a metroidvania too, so you need to find specific items to open specific ways.
